channel.title: CVE Feed for Kieback&Peter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kieback&Peter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43698|2024-10-23T14:42:24.238Z -- kieback%26peter -- ddc4040e
item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series uses weak credentials, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to get full admin rights on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-41717|2024-10-23T14:43:52.114Z -- kieback%26peter -- ddc4020e
item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series is vulnerable to a path traversal vulnerability, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to read files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-43812|2024-10-23T14:43:37.078Z -- kieback%26peter -- ddc4040e
item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series has an insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker with access to /etc/passwd to read the password hashes of all users on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-43812|2024-10-22T21:19:23.383Z -- kieback%26peter -- ddc4040e
item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series has an insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker with access to /etc/passwd to read the password hashes of all users on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-41717|2024-10-22T21:13:37.183Z -- kieback%26peter -- ddc4020e
item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series is vulnerable to a path traversal vulnerability, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to read files on the system.

item.description: Kieback & Peter's DDC4000 series uses weak credentials, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to get full admin rights on the system.
